question: Please tell me whether the FIRST statement or the SECOND statement comes closer to your own views — even if neither is exactly right. c. Immigrants in our country today want to adopt your nationality customs and way of life
raw_output:
I believe the statement that immigrants in our country today want to adopt our customs and way of life is closer to my views. This suggests that many immigrants are interested in integrating and embracing the local culture, which aligns with my understanding of current immigration dynamics. 

ANSWER: B
